description: Gets information about the specified thing type. Requires permission to access the DescribeThingType action.

parameters.name: thingTypeName
parameters.description: The name of the thing type.

nested_items.name: thingTypeName
nested_items.description: The name of the thing type.

nested_items.name: thingTypeProperties
nested_items.description: The ThingTypeProperties contains information about the thing type including description, a list of searchable thing attribute names, and MQTT5 configuration.

nested_items.name: thingTypeDescription
nested_items.description: The description of the thing type.

nested_items.name: searchableAttributes
nested_items.description: A list of searchable thing attribute names.

nested_items.name: mqtt5Configuration
nested_items.description: The configuration to add user-defined properties to enrich MQTT 5 messages.

nested_items.name: propagatingAttributes
nested_items.description: An object that represents the propagating thing attributes and the connection attributes.

nested_items.name: userPropertyKey
nested_items.description: The key of the user property key-value pair.

nested_items.name: thingAttribute
nested_items.description: The user-defined thing attribute that is propagating for MQTT 5 message enrichment.

nested_items.name: connectionAttribute
nested_items.description: The attribute associated with the connection between a device and Amazon Web Services IoT Core.

nested_items.name: thingTypeMetadata
nested_items.description: The ThingTypeMetadata contains additional information about the thing type including: creation date and time, a value indicating whether the thing type is deprecated, and a date and time when it was deprecated.

nested_items.name: deprecated
nested_items.description: Whether the thing type is deprecated. If true, no new things could be associated with this type.

nested_items.name: deprecationDate
nested_items.description: The date and time when the thing type was deprecated.

nested_items.name: creationDate
nested_items.description: The date and time when the thing type was created.
